applyTo: "docs/**/*.md"
---

# Documentation Guidelines

## Structure
- Use clear headings with proper hierarchy (H1 > H2 > H3)
- Include code examples for technical concepts
- Keep paragraphs concise

## Code Blocks
- Always specify language for syntax highlighting
- Use realistic, working examples
- Include expected output where helpful

## Links
- Use relative paths for internal docs: `[Architecture](ARCHITECTURE.md)`
- Verify all links work before committing

## Updates
- Keep docs in sync with code changes
- Update API.md when endpoints change
- Update RUNBOOK.md for deployment changes

## Audience
- ONBOARDING.md: New developers
- ARCHITECTURE.md: Technical deep-dive
- RUNBOOK.md: Operations/DevOps
- API.md: API consumers
